articles.title: Coronavirus warning: 'My toe is turning blue' - woman explains shock COVID-19 symptom - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS is a deadly infection that's easily spread, and the disease has already killed more than 16,000 people in the UK. One COVID-19 patient has explained that one of her infection signs came when her toe had turned blue. These are the most common mild …

articles.author: FOX 35 Orlando
articles.title: Heat map released shows 'hot spots' of COVID-19 in Brevard County - FOX 35 Orlando
articles.description: The areas identified as coronavirus hot spots in Brevard County are Satellite Beach, Indian Harbour Beach, West Melbourne, and Cocoa.
articles.content:
BREVARD COUNTY, Fla. - Brevard County officials have released a heat map showing the areas of the county that have COVID-19 cases.
As of Sunday morning, the Florida Department of Health says that there are 25,996 cases of coronavirus statewide. 215 of those … [+2816 chars]

articles.author: Anita Bartholomew
articles.title: Coronavirus: How CDC Lab Contamination, And A Failure To Cooperate Globally, Led To Catastrophe - Forbes
articles.description: Failures happen. Contamination happens. But if there is one thing that has stood in the way of saving the country from the worst of the pandemic, it might be the country’s own go-it-alone attitude.
